cmd: /sbin/my_init --branch %(branch_name)s -- echo '10.128.248.211 zk1' > /etc/hosts; /bin/bash -c 'export PYTHONPATH=/root/rockerbox-metrics/metrics/:$PYTHONPATH; export LNK_DIR=/root/rockerbox-metrics/.link; echo $LNK_DIR; cd /root/rockerbox-metrics/metrics/static/js/rockerbox/turnip; npm install; npm run pretest; cd /root/rockerbox-metrics/metrics; python /root/rockerbox-metrics/metrics/tornado_websocket.py --port=8888 --skip_buffers --skip_spark_sql --routes=crusher_routes,user_login,misc_services,user_advertiser_routes,v1_crusher_routes,health'
